ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet
ygData.msgSnippet: Its actually in the features/In Development section.  Here is the Quote from the website (same as updated manua)... The various Specialization skills will be
ygData.messageBody:
Its actually in the features/In Development section. Here is the Quote
from the website (same as updated manua)...

The various Specialization skills will be implemented such that if a spell
is
cast in, for example, the abjuration family, the Specialization -
Abjuration
skill will be checked (if present) and if successful, will decrease the
amount
of mana used to cast the spell. The Specialization skills are as follows:
Specialization - Abjuration, Specialization - Alteration, Specialization -
Conjuration, Specialization - Divination, and Specialization - Evocation.

The part that scares me is the future tense of "will be implemented".
When?


Malkin


Ziffnab MageStorm wrote:

> From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
>
> Goto the official EQ website and read in the Developer section. You
> will notice that SPECIALIZATION has been implemented now for our use.
> Yes, it was not working before, but is working now and explains how it
> works.
>
